items.content_html: Raptor is a lightweight middleware framework for Deno, focusing on readability and clear code.

items.content_html: Elmio is a lightweight, proof-of-concept web framework inspired by The Elm Architecture. It's built using the Rust programming language and compiles to WebAssembly.

items.content_html: Join is a lightweight and flexible Kanban board application designed to help teams and individuals manage tasks and projects efficiently. Inspired by Trello, Join enables you to create boards, lists, and cards to organize your workflow seamlessly.
items.title: Heiko-Lemmert/join-project: Join is a lightweight and flexible Kanban board application designed to help teams and individuals manage tasks and projects efficiently. Inspired by Trello, Join enables you to create boards, lists, and cards to organize your workflow seamlessly.

items.content_html: A lightweight e-commerce project built ReactJs and Vite having functionalities of User Login/Logout, Home page to display all products offered to sell, Cart page for products added to cart by user.
items.title: Ankush-nitjsr/shopifyLite: A lightweight e-commerce project built ReactJs and Vite having functionalities of User Login/Logout, Home page to display all products offered to sell, Cart page for products added to cart by user.

items.content_html: observerly's lightweight, zero-dependency, type safe astrometry library written in TypeScript. This library can be used to ascertain to positions of the Sun, Moon and the planets, as well as ascertain transit times for any astronomical object.
items.title: observerly/astrometry: observerly's lightweight, zero-dependency, type safe astrometry library written in TypeScript. This library can be used to ascertain to positions of the Sun, Moon and the planets, as well as ascertain transit times for any astronomical object.

items.content_html: A modern blog platform built with Next.js, TypeScript, SQLite, and TailwindCSS. This project features Static Generation (SSG), Incremental Static Generation (ISR), Markdown support, SEO optimization, user comments, dark/light mode, and an SQLite database for serverless, lightweight data storage.
items.title: aryanranderiya/Blog-Next.js: A modern blog platform built with Next.js, TypeScript, SQLite, and TailwindCSS. This project features Static Generation (SSG), Incremental Static Generation (ISR), Markdown support, SEO optimization, user comments, dark/light mode, and an SQLite database for serverless, lightweight data storage.

items.content_html: Hello the name is Mudit. I am using MERN stack for this assignment as this application with it's lightweight operations and simplicity requirements can be best created using an express backend. Mongo DB database is created and utilized because of the dynamic nature of posts and the type of data being unstructured.
items.title: Mudit2003/cloudsek-assignment: Hello the name is Mudit. I am using MERN stack for this assignment as this application with it's lightweight operations and simplicity requirements can be best created using an express backend. Mongo DB database is created and utilized because of the dynamic nature of posts and the type of data being unstructured.
